title: Super Bowl LII Recap with Eagles HC Doug Pederson
itunes:title: Super Bowl LII Recap with Eagles HC Doug Pederson
description:
Fresh off winning the Super Bowl, Philadelphia Eagles head coach Doug Pederson joined the podcast to talk about how analytics plays a part in his decision-making during a game. Also, Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith recap the biggest plays of Super Bowl LII and make bold predictions for next NFL season.

  • Super Bowl LII Recap (0:30)
  • Who called the "Philly Special"? (12:30)
  • Nick Foles' impressive performance (17:30)
  • Interview with Eagles HC Doug Pederson (23:00)
  • Bold predictions for 2018 (33:30)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
